extendedInfo.description: Shake Dice is the best dice game in the Google Play Market.It includes normal dice, housework dice, lover dice,sex dice,drink dice and custom dice.Play simply,shake your moblie only.It is good stuff to bring fun to your life, promote emotional communication,strengthen friendship with your friend,improve your sex life.Lite version has no custom dice.Pro version can customize dice number and the text in each side of the dice.If you buy Pro version,you can use your intelligence to design the dice for yourself.Version 1.0.5 -- Fix some bugVersion 1.0.41. Add volume control,you can use mobile volume key to control dice sound.2. Add time dice and timer in lover dice,make it more interesting.3. Fix some bug.

reviews.title: Ads crash it, custom dice not on free version
reviews.comment: Listing implies that custom dice are part of the free app, but that\'s not the case. App crashes every time I stitch dice, while trying to display ad consent screen. Oh, and compulsory sound is v annoying.
reviews.author: Al McNicoll

reviews.comment: If you should turn the sound off I would love this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waist of time
reviews.comment: It repeats the things like 6x den skips to another one n repeats it for 6x as well....
reviews.author: francisco munoz
